WorkItem.Description: I'm not getting my expertise calculated right, which I thought was fixed in 4.1.04 (on EJ) - character file attached.

Comments.Message: You will need to be more specific. How much expertise should you have? In my dev build and the 4.1.04 release, the Unleashed Rage talent is working properly (affects DPS and the tooltip). I cannot view your character on the armory (says "Oops! Character Not Available")

Expertise Dodge cap is 26/26 for a shaman.  This is made up of 8 Expertise from Unleashed Rage and 541 expertise rating (not including weapon racials since you are a draenei).
Since I can't find you on Battle.Net, I only have your character.xml to go by.  The stats display shows you at 18 expertise (8 from UR and 327 rating).  Adding up your expertise rating from your gear manually, you are at 327 rating.  This is below the cap mentioned above.
Now since I can't find you on Battle.Net, I don't know what it is saying your expertise/expertise rating should be.  So, as Jothay said, can you please be a bit more specific.
OK, in which case I'm probably being dim. :/ Sorry about that!

I double check to  make sure I was not missing something.. 
I have 26/26 expertise in game, but when import my charc via load via battlenet, is shows 22 (mouse over--8 expertise/436 expertise rating).. My talent tree shows I have 2 points in Unleashed Rage. Somewhere is looks like rawr is not adding the expertise points from the talent tree.

Attach is my .xml file

The 8 expertise that is shown in the mouse over is the expertise from Unleashed Rage.  So it is adding the expertise from the talent tree.  What is likely happening, is that there is some expertise rating from gear that is going missing.  Will look into it.
